EmailTemplate.name: Notice of Change of Dealer
EmailTemplate.subject: Notice of Change of Dealer {!Account.Name} Lease #
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Thank you for choosing SunPower solar for your home energy needs.
We would like to inform you that we are changing your Partner from Smart Energy Solar, Inc. to Sea Bright Solar - CA.
If you have signed a SunPower lease agreement, rest assured that the terms of your agreement will remain intact and unchanged. We have included a “Notice of Change” document to inform you that your assigned dealer has changed from Smart Energy Solar, Inc. to Sea Bright Solar - CA. The purpose of this notice is to allow Sea Bright Solar - CA proceed with your installation and the interconnection of your system.
If you have any additional questions regarding your solar installation, please feel free to contact your new dealer directly at the contact information provided below:
Dealer’s Name: Sea Bright Solar - CA Contact: Rick Sikes Email: rick@seabrightsolar.com Office: (909) 335-0820
We are excited to welcome you to the SunPower family. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns by calling 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693) and one of our Solar Advisors will be happy to assist you.
Warm Regards, SunPower
